column2: Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings, Inc. provides outdoor advertising solutions. The company is headquartered in San Antonio, Texas and currently employs 5,800 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in providing clients with advertising through billboards, street furniture displays, transit displays and other out-of-home advertising displays. The firm operates through two segments: Americas outdoor advertising (Americas) and International outdoor advertising (International). Americas segment consists of operations primarily in the United States. Americas assets include printed and digital billboards, transit displays, including airports, street furniture and wallscapes and other spectaculars. Its International segment consists of operations primarily in Europe, Asia and Latin America. International assets include street furniture, billboards, transit displays, retail displays, public bike programs and other spectaculars, which it owns or operates under lease or license agreements.
